snippet: China’s detention of a German art handler and a Chinese associate, on charges that they undervalued imported art to avoid customs duties, has caused anxiety in the art scene.
abstract: China’s detention of German art handler Nils Jennrich and Lydia Chu, his Chinese associate, on charges that they undervalued imported art to avoid customs duties causes anxiety in the art world and has tempered the thriving contemporary-art scene in Berlin.

byline.original: By ANDREW JACOBS and CLARE PENNINGTON

lead_paragraph: China’s detention of a German art handler and a Chinese associate, on charges that they undervalued imported art to avoid customs duties, has caused anxiety in the art scene.

headline.seo: Art World Unnerved by China’s Detention of Two
headline.main: Two Arrests in China Unnerve Art World
headline.print_headline: Two Arrests In China Unnerve Art World
